Kuasa Hukum Novel Baswesan Akan Laporkan Dewi Tanjung
07 Nov 2019, 19:32 by Chairul Umam


Kuasa Hukum Novel Baswesan Akan Laporkan Dewi Tanjung

KBRN, Jakarta : Kader PDIP Dewi Tanjung telah melaporkan dan membuat Berita Acara Pidana terkait penyiraman air keras yang di alami penyidik senior Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan ke Polda Metro Jaya. Dewi tanjung menuding Novel melakukan rekayasa dalam kasus penyiraman air keras ke matanya yang terjadi April 2017.
Menanggapi pengaduan tersebut, Kuasa Hukum Novel Baswedan Saur Siagian menyangkal tuduhan Dewi Tanjung , saur menyatakan ini adalah adalah fakta hukum, bahwa peristiwa penyerangan air keras ke mata Novel itu adalah benar adanya, bahkan Presiden juga sudah meminta Polisi memgungkap pelakunya.
"Saya kira ini sangat serius, karena apa?, Polisi, bahkan Presiden meminta kepada Polisi agar segera mengungkap tuntas, artinya ini adalah fakta hukum, bahwa peristiwa penyerangan air keras ke mata Novel itu adalah benar adanya," ungkap Saur di gedung KPK, Kamis (07/11/2019).
Lebih lanjut Saur mengungkapkan akan melakukan tindakan hukum yaitu melakukan pelaporan kepada Dewi Tanjung dengan  tuduhan kebohongan.
"Menurut Pak Novel ini agak serius.Nah oleh karena itu kami akan lakukan pelaporan soal pidananya. Saya kira paling tidak dia berbohong," ungkap Saur.
Di samping itu, Saur Siagian dkk juga mendesak Presiden Jokowi untuk segera menuntaskan pengungkapan kasus Novel dengan membentuk tim independen yang bertanggung jawab secara langsung kepada Presiden.
Sementara itu Dewi Tanjung sebaai pelapor berpendapat kasus penyiraman air keras Novel Baswedan merupakan rekayasa. Menurut dia, terdapat banyak kejanggalan dalam kasus itu, seperti efek dari air keras yang hanya merusak bagian mata Novel. Menurut dia, dampak dari air keras seharusnya juga merusak hingga bagian pipi.
Perempuan yang juga pernah menuding Politikus Partai Amanat Nasional Amien Rais melakukan makar itu menilai ada kejanggalan dari video-video yang memperlihatkan kondisi Novel, termasuk salah satu video Novel dengan keadaan mata tidak rusak yang viral di sosial media.
Laporan itu terdaftar dalam nomor laporan LP/7171/XI/2019/PMJ, Dit. Reskrimsus, tanggal 6 November 2019.

Attorney Baswesan Novel Will Report Dewi Tanjung
Nov. 07 2019, 19:32 by Chairul Umam


Attorney Baswesan Novel Will Report Dewi Tanjung

KBRN, Jakarta: PDIP cadre Dewi Tanjung has reported and made a Minutes of the Criminal Act related to the pouring of hard water that was experienced by senior investigators from the Corruption Eradication Commission Novel Baswedan to the Metro Jaya Regional Police. Dewi Tanjung accuses Novel of engineering the case of splashing hard water into her eyes that occurred in April 2017.
Responding to the complaint, Baswedan Saur Siagian's Legal Counsel denied the charge of Dewi Tanjung, Saur stated that this was a legal fact, that the incident of attacking hard water into the novel's eyes was true, even the President had also asked the Police to reveal the culprit.
"I think this is very serious, because of what ?, The police, even the President asked the Police to immediately reveal completely, meaning that this is a legal fact, that the incident of attacking hard water into the novel's eyes is true," Saur said at the KPK building on Thursday (11/07/2019).
Saur further revealed that he would take legal action by reporting to Dewi Tanjung with lies.
"According to Mr. Novel this is rather serious. Well, therefore we will do reporting on the criminal. I think at least he lied," Saur said.
In addition, Saur Siagian et al also urged President Jokowi to immediately resolve the disclosure of the Novel case by forming an independent team directly responsible to the President.
Meanwhile Dewi Tanjung as a reporter believes that the Baswedan Novel hard watering case was fabricated. According to him, there are many irregularities in the case, such as the effect of hard water which only damages the eyes of the novel. According to him, the impact of hard water should also damage the cheeks.
The woman who also once accused the National Mandate Party Politician Amien Rais of treason was judging there were irregularities from the videos that showed the condition of the novel, including one of the video novel with a state of undamaged eyes that were viral in social media.
The report is registered in report number LP / 7171 / XI / 2019 / PMJ, Dit. Reskrimsus, November 6, 2019.
